name: A'dal's Signet of Defense
rules: [Exhaust] -> Target armor has +3 DEF this turn.
flavour: (You have proven yourself as a being of great power.) - A'dal

name: Aegis of the Vindicator
rules: When an opposing hero or ally becomes exhausted, your hero heals 2 damage from itself.

name: Band of Crimson Fury
rules: 3, Discard a card -> The next time damage would be dealt with an ability you control this turn, that much +3 is dealt instead.
flavour: The Legion reelsâ€¦a pit lord commander has been defeated. - Nazgrel

name: Cloak of the Pit Stalker
rules: [Exhaust] -> Target attacker has -1 health this turn.
flavour: Keeps you dry in rains of both water and blood.

name: Crystalheart Pulse-Staff
rules: 2, [Exhaust] -> Remove a friendly ally fom the game. If you do, its owner puts it into play at the end of your turn.

name: Eredar Wand of Obliteration
rules: When your hero deals shadow damage to an opponent's hero, you may destroy an ability, ally, or equipment you control. If you do, that opponent destroys an ability, ally, or equipment he controls.

name: Eye of Magtheridon
rules: If 1 would be rolled on a die, you may change it to any value on that die instead.
flavour: The body parts of Magtheridon are said to hold tremendous, latent power. The Eye, when properly channeled, will bend fate toward the will of the user.

name: Girdle of the Endless Pit
rules: At the start of your turn, put 1 damage on your hero.

name: Glaive of the Pit
rules: Opposing heroes have -5 health.
flavour: Woe to those who choose to stand against the glaive.

name: Heavy Netherweave Bandage
rules: 1, Put Heavy Netherweave Bandage on the bottom of its owners deck -> Your hero heals 6 damage from target hero or ally. Use only on your turn.

name: Karaborian Talisman
rules: When you complete a quest, you may destroy Karaborian Talisman. If you do, turn that quest face up.

name: Liar's Tongue Gloves
rules: 1, [Exhaust] -> Name a card type and remove a card in your hand from the game face down. Target opponent guesses whether that card has that type, then reveals it. If he's right, put it into your graveyard. Otherwise, put it into your hand and draw two cards.

name: Naaru Lightwarden's Band
rules: Friendly heroes have +5 health.
flavour: With the support of the naaru, the Light will triumph. - Adyen the Lightwarden

name: Phoenix-fire Band
rules: 1, Destroy Phoenix-fire Band -> Prevent all fire damage that would be dealt to target hero or ally this turn.
flavour: The reward for battling your way to the heart of the chamber and destroying the foul corrupter!

name: Ring of the Recalcitrant
rules: Friendly heroes have +1 ATK while attacking.

name: Soul-Eater's Handwraps
rules: When an ability, ally, equipment, or hero readies, its controller puts the top card of his deck into his graveyard.
flavour: You too will be consumed. - Harrigan Soulsunder

name: Super Mana Potion
rules: 4, Destroy Super Mana Potion -> Draw four cards.
flavour: One part felweed, two parts dreaming glory - all part useful.

name: Superior Mana Oil
rules: Superior Mana Oil enters play attached to one of your weapons.; At the start of your turn, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an ability card, put it into your hand. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.

name: Terror Pit Girdle
rules: Your hero is Untargetable while an ally is in your party.

name: Thundering Greathelm
rules: When you play an ally, your weapons have +1 ATK this turn.
flavour: The helm will inspire even the greatest of cowards.
